alias.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: used when giving someone’s real name, especially an actor’s or a criminal’s name, together with another name they use
alias.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: ‘Friends’ star Jennifer Aniston, alias Rachel Green
alias.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a false name, usually used by a criminal
alias.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: a spy operating under the alias Barsad
